content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; fuel inventory contains coal and furnace result holds 6 copper plates; energy: 1600.0.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs (research: automation); status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 4424.
- ElectricityGroup with id=4424 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) intended for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); neighbours include pipes at (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5) and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); fluid_system: [15244]; steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5); neighbours include pipes at (-7.5, 25.5) and (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system: [15244]; neighbours include pipes at (-8.5, 23.5), (-8.5, 22.5) and (-9.5, 23.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15244 at approximately (-6.5, 20.5); status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15245 at approximately (-2.5, 20.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15246 at approximately (-0.5, 21.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15251 at approximately (-3.5, 23.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15250 at approximately (-7.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15255 at approximately (3.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15254 at approximately (2.5, 24.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15257 at approximately (-0.5, 28.5); status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Failures:
  - Repeated attempts to supply water to the steam engine using non-working PipeGroups with fluid_system IDs [14556, 14599, 14642, 14685, 14728, 14771, 14814, 14857] (from earlier steps) and [14900, 14943, 14986, 15029, 15072, 15115, 15158, 15201] (in the latest execution steps) have led to aborted connection attempts. Ensure that the targeted PipeGroup exists and is active with the correct fluid_system ID before attempting the connection.

• Inefficient Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Replace fixed 10-second wait intervals with dynamic status checks to improve pipeline network stabilization and reduce idle time.
